text: Chris Applebaum is an American music video director. He has filmed music videos for many famous musicians including Rihanna, Hilary Duff, and Britney Spears. Twenty-one of his music videos have become #1 on MTV. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official page * IMDB page Category:American movie directors Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:American Jews Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Chris Applebaum
